-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Storable instances with endianness
--   
--   Storable instances with endianness
@package storable-endian
@version 0.2.5


-- | Storable instances with endianness.
module Data.Storable.Endian
newtype LittleEndian a
LE :: a -> LittleEndian a
newtype BigEndian a
BE :: a -> BigEndian a
class HasLittleEndian a
peekLE :: HasLittleEndian a => Ptr a -> IO a
pokeLE :: HasLittleEndian a => Ptr a -> a -> IO ()
class HasBigEndian a
peekBE :: HasBigEndian a => Ptr a -> IO a
pokeBE :: HasBigEndian a => Ptr a -> a -> IO ()
instance HasBigEndian Double
instance HasBigEndian Float
instance HasBigEndian Word64
instance HasBigEndian Word32
instance HasBigEndian Word16
instance HasBigEndian Int64
instance HasBigEndian Int32
instance HasBigEndian Int16
instance HasLittleEndian Double
instance HasLittleEndian Float
instance HasLittleEndian Word64
instance HasLittleEndian Word32
instance HasLittleEndian Word16
instance HasLittleEndian Int64
instance HasLittleEndian Int32
instance HasLittleEndian Int16
instance (HasBigEndian a, Storable a) => Storable (BigEndian a)
instance (HasLittleEndian a, Storable a) => Storable (LittleEndian a)
